main event: A civilian observer reported sighting a dark mass in front of an exhaust of a craft in Girard, Ohio on July 7, 1966.
interesting points: The observer noted the exhaust light shut off for 5 seconds while the mass was still visible., The observer felt that the presence of the craft involved communication with the crew inside., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds and the object moved in a northeast direction., The observer believed the craft to be a result of ingenious Russian design., The witness reported an unusual sensory experience indicating ESP during the sighting.
sighted object: dark mass in front of an exhaust
witness description: The witness described having sensations related to extra-sensory perception during the encounter.
